  1. ‌var rome = require('./rome');
  2. ‌var momentum = require('./momentum');

  4. rome.use(global.moment);

  6. if (momentum.moment === void 0) {
  7.   throw new Error('rome depends on moment.js, you can get it at http://momentjs.com, or you could use the bundled distribution file instead.');
  8. }
